headline: Trinity Hills Valley, S.A. Signs Franchise Agreement with Marriott International for Tribute Portfolio Hotel and Residences at Surf Lagoon-Anchored Resort in Panama
summary: Trinity Hills Valley, S.A., the Panamanian land-owning entity affiliated with US-based developer TrinityHills Capital, today announced the signing of a franchise agreement with Marriott International, Inc. to develop and operate a Tribute Portfolio hotel and residences as part of a pioneering surf lagoon-anchored resort. This marks a significant milestone in bringing upscale, experiential hospitality to Panama's emerging tourism landscape.

This marks a significant milestone in bringing upscale, experiential hospitality to Panama's emerging tourism landscape.
